skills.combat.description: Gain XP by killing zombies with melee weapons!
skills.precision.description: Gain XP by killing zombies with guns!
skills.defense.description: Gain XP by receiving damage from enemies!
skills.vitality.resilience.description: Increases the minimum amount of hearts you can have after dying.
skills.vitality.healing.description: Provides a bonus heal from all healing sources.
skills.athlete.description: Gain XP by running, jumping and swimming!
skills.athlete.dodge.description: Increases the chance you can evade an attack within melee range.
skills.endurance.description: Gain XP by running, jumping, swimming, or by receiving damage from enemies!
skills.endurance.fall_reduction.descript: Increases the distance you can fall without taking damage.
skills.spelunker.fortune.description: Increase chance to get extra ore when mining.
skills.spelunker.experience_gained.descr: Increase experience gain for level from any source.
